name: Carolieto
0:
”Alexa, Turn on the Rain Shower”
”Alexa, Turn on the Shower”
”Alexa, Activate the Mist Shower”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Carolieto adds Intelligence to Smart bathrooms by controlling them with A.I. (Artificial Intelligence). This concept is what is behind Carolieto Intelligent Bathrooms. 

With Carolieto on Amazon Alexa, you can now enjoy the various flows of your Ceiling Shower or on-the-wall Body Jets with just a command on Alexa. 

You can enjoy your Carolieto showering experience with simple voice commands such as:
Turn on the Rain Shower
Activate the Mist Shower
Switch on the Cascade Shower
Turn on the Curtain Shower
Set shower color blue
Set shower brightness to 80%
Turn off the shower
Set steam temperature to 45 degrees
Turn on the steam
Turn off the steam after 15 minutes

All you need to do is download the Amazon Alexa App on your Android phone and link it with the Carolieto App. And you are ready to be overwhelmed by your Carolieto Intelligent Bathroom.

For any help or guidance, you can always reach out to us at 1800 123 2575 (Toll-free) or visit us at www.carolieto.it
